<< bone Graphics functions clf >>

cla

Clear axes.

Syntax

cla
cla(ax)
ca = cla(...)

Input argument

ax

a scalar graphics object on an existing axes.

Output argument

ca

a graphics object: used axes graphics object.

Description

cla clears the current axes.

Example

f = figure();
x = linspace(0, 2*pi);
y = sin(3 * x);
plot(x, y)
sleep(5)
cla

See also

gca, clf.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
